[Y]Palette Tricks
[W]Mood changes without redrawing.
[c][m.]
[W]Palette swaps can signal danger,
[W]nighttime or power states cheaply.
[W]Consistent colour semantics help
[W]players read status quickly.
[c][m.]
[G]- Reserve warning colours.
[G]- Test contrast.
[G]- Avoid noisy combinations.
[m][m-]
[Y]TIP
[C]Border colour can reinforce scene
[C]mood.
[c][m.]
[C]0 MAIN   [W]# HELP
